blackbeard:WeaponPower.NAME: Weapons
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an attack card, one Durability of your rightmost Weapon is used and card's damage is increased by Weapon's attack.

blackbeard:ParrotPower.NAME: Parrot
DESCRIPTIONS: The last card played each turn is played an additional time.

blackbeard:SwordDancePower.NAME: Sword Dance
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, your next Attack uses all equipped Weapons.

blackbeard:ResistancePower.NAME: Resistance
DESCRIPTIONS: damage from enemy attacks. (Enemy intents always show actual incoming damage, with Resistance taken into account.)

blackbeard:InfiniteBarragePower.NAME: Infinite Barrage
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add #b

blackbeard:ToastPower.NAME: Toast
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, lose #b

blackbeard:DamageAtTheEndOfNextTurnPower.NAME: End Of Next Turn Damage
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of next turn, you take #b

blackbeard:DamageAtTheEndOfThisTurnPower.NAME: End Turn Damage
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of this turn, you take #b

blackbeard:WeaponMasteryPower.NAME: Weapon Mastery
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you Equip a Weapon, draw #b

blackbeard:SalvagerPower.NAME: Salvager
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a Weapon is destroyed, gain #b

blackbeard:LoseEnergyNextTurnPower.NAME: Lose Energy Next Turn
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, lose #b

blackbeard:ArmorUpPower.NAME: Armor Up
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, whenever you attack with a Weapon, gain #b

blackbeard:IntoxicationPower.NAME: Intoxication
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, lose #b

blackbeard:PenknifePower.NAME: Penknife
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #yAttack that uses at least one Weapon deals double damage.

blackbeard:DamageWhenIntangibleEndsPower.NAME: End Of Intangible Damage
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the turn on which you are no longer Intangible, you take #b

blackbeard:RustyThorns.NAME: Rusty Thorns
DESCRIPTIONS: damage back and reduces Rusty Thorns by #b1.
